TI: [Rigid and flexible links in the neurophysiological correlates of immunological processes].
AB: The regulation of immune reactions is maintained by a brain system consiting of rigid and versatile ("flexible") links. The main rigid link of this system is the posterior hypothalamic area. This area has a minimal latency and obvious reactions of single neuron activity, excitability, DC potential level. A correlation between the rigid and versatile links during separate phases of immune reaction, is shown. The discovered reaction depends on immune reactivity.
TT: Zhestkie i gibkie zven'ia v neirofiziologicheskikh korreliatakh immunologicheskikh protsessov.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1984 Jul;70(7):997-1006.
